divs: sighting detailsdriving south on florida turnpike and noticed a strange 'fireball" with a tail falling to the earth very slowly. thought it was a plane on fire crashing. the before it hit the ground, it seperated into4-5 orbs\objects and flew into different directions and different angles but relatively horizontal. objects looked to be moving at different speeds until we could no longer see them. this occured in homestead florida. near homestead airforce base.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Homestead
There were 3 other sightings in Homestead on or around February 28th 2010
